title: Definitions
context: ยง457B-2 Definitions. As used in this chapter, unless the context otherwise requires: &ldquo;Administrator&rdquo; means the individual responsible for planning, organizing, directing, and controlling of the operation of a nursing home. &ldquo;Department&rdquo; means the department of commerce and consumer affairs. &ldquo;Director&rdquo; means the director of commerce and consumer affairs. &ldquo;Nursing home&rdquo; means any nursing facility licensed by the department of health. &ldquo;Practice of nursing home administration&rdquo; means the planning, organizing, directing, or controlling of the operation of a nursing home. [L 1970, c 63, pt of ยง1; am L 1994, c 184, ยง3; am L 1997, c 235, ยง2] Revision Note Numeric designations deleted and definitions rearranged.
